StringBags.Name: msg_cancelExport
StringBags.Value:
Do you want to cancel export?
Press [Yes] to cancel
Press [No] to continue.

StringBags.Value: Before previewing this file,please save this modified JMD File.

StringBags.Name: msg_saveMsg
StringBags.Value:
Do you want to save this modified file?JMD Loader will reload the new File after saving.

Press [Yes] to save
Press [No] to cancel

StringBags.Name: msg_exitsaving
StringBags.Value:
Do you want to save this modified file before exiting?

Press [Yes] to save
Press [No] to exit.
